title: We Art: Personalized art classes inspired by Korean curriculum for ages 5 to 19
description: We Art prides itself on personalized teaching methods and courses inspired by the Korean art curriculum. The 'Little Explorers' class is designed for kids aged 5 to 9 years old, introducing them to drawing, painting, collage, and mixed media. Older kids aged 10 to 19 years old grasp fundamental elements of drawing, watercolours, and acrylic painting, and also try silkscreen and relief printmaking. The program aims to encourage children's creative talents in various art forms, fostering motor skills, language development, spatial awareness, and decision-making through diverse artistic activities, ensuring a comprehensive and tailored artistic education for different age groups.

title: International Community School (ICS) Virtual Open House 2025 for Prospective Students and Parents
description: Discover how the International Community School's (ICS) Advanced Placement (AP) courses prepare students for university and beyond through rigorous, college-level academics. ICS students consistently outperform global benchmarks, gaining a competitive edge for top university applications and often earning early college credit. This virtual open house provides prospective families with an in-depth look at ICS's globally recognised American curriculum, personalised academic counselling, and supportive community. Learn about the impressive university acceptances of the Class of 2025 and hear inspiring stories from successful alumni. Attendees can explore how ICS equips students with essential tools, values, and real-world experience, fostering confident individuals ready to thrive. Sign up to secure your spot and potentially receive a $500 waiver on your application fee, making this an invaluable opportunity to understand ICS's commitment to academic excellence and purposeful learning.

title: Opening of the NEW Singapore Oceanarium (Former S.E.A. Aquarium)
description: The new Singapore Oceanarium, formerly the S.E.A. Aquarium, is set to open on 23 July 2025 at Resorts World Sentosa, offering an expansive marine experience three times larger than its predecessor. Boasting 22 immersive zones, the Oceanarium will guide visitors through diverse aquatic environments, from shallow waters to the deep sea, and even prehistoric oceans to modern-day marine life. Highlights include Ocean Wonders with one of the world's largest kreisel habitats for thousands of moon jellies, Singapore's Coast featuring mangrove-inspired landscapes and interactive habitats, and Ancient Waters and Conquering Land showcasing prehistoric ocean animals with life-sized animatronics. Other zones like Migrators, Open Ocean (with a 36-meter viewing panel), Whale Fall and Sea Mount (focusing on marine protection), Hallway of Hope, Spirit of Exploration, and Pier Adventure provide engaging educational and interactive experiences. Additionally, the new Research and Learning Centre adjacent to the Oceanarium will serve as a hub for marine science, featuring learning labs and collaborative spaces. Families can look forward to a comprehensive and engaging exploration of the marine world. While specific ticket prices and opening hours are yet to be announced, the Oceanarium promises an exciting adventure for all ages.

title: National Day Parade 2025: Grand Celebrations at Padang and Marina Bay
description: Experience the grandeur of Singapore's National Day Parade 2025, a landmark SG60 celebration extending across the Padang and Marina Bay. Spectators at both venues will witness synchronised shows, including the iconic Red Lions parachute descent, naval divers in the Bay, light projections, and stunning fireworks displays. The mobile column showcasing military vehicles and an aerial flypast at the Padang, alongside a maritime display at Marina Bay, promise an unforgettable spectacle. Enjoy performances by local icons like Kit Chan, Charlie Lim, and Dick Lee. This year's parade, with its 'Majulah Singapura' theme and new theme song 'Here We Are', accommodates an additional 200,000 attendees, making it the largest celebration yet. Don't miss this historic event.

title: National Day Parade 2025 Preview and Rehearsal Shows at Iconic Venues
description: Catch the excitement of the National Day Parade 2025 before the main event at these special preview and rehearsal shows. Witness all the highlights, including fighter jets, the precision of the Red Lions, and dazzling fireworks displays. These rehearsals offer a fantastic opportunity to experience the full spectacle without the National Day crowds. Ticket balloting is available for those wishing to attend these exclusive previews at both the Padang and Marina Bay. For those unable to secure tickets, numerous free fireworks viewing spots around the city offer excellent vantage points to see the sky light up during these practice sessions. Prepare for a thrilling glimpse into Singapore's biggest celebration.
datetime_display: 26 July and 2 August 2025, timing TBC (fireworks around 8pm onwards)

title: Republic of Singapore Air Force Island Flypast for National Day 2025
description: Experience the awe-inspiring RSAF Island Flypast as part of the National Day 2025 celebrations. This highly anticipated segment allows residents across Singapore to witness majestic fighter jets and helicopters soaring through the skies, bringing the NDP festivities directly to various neighbourhoods. While exact routes and timings are yet to be released for 2025, past flypasts have covered broad areas including Woodlands, Sengkang, Punggol, Jurong, and East Coast. This free public spectacle is a perfect way to partake in the National Day spirit from the comfort of your home or local community, offering a patriotic display for all ages. Stay tuned for the official announcement of detailed routes and timings to catch this stunning aerial showcase.

title: National Day 2025 Heartland Celebrations: Carnivals and Family Fun
description: Join the vibrant National Day 2025 celebrations happening across five heartland locations on August 10th. These family-friendly festivities promise a day filled with joy and patriotism, featuring an array of carnival games, engaging family activities, and captivating live performances. Attendees can also explore static displays of vehicles from the SAF, SCDF, and SPF, offering a unique glimpse into Singapore's defence and emergency services. The day culminates with dazzling fireworks displays, bringing the National Day spirit closer to home for all residents. While entry is free, attendees are required to have a ticket, ensuring a managed and enjoyable experience for everyone. Stay tuned for details on specific locations.

title: El Chido's National Day Fusion Menu with Skyline and Fireworks Views
description: Celebrate Singapore's National Day with El Chido at Pullman Singapore Hill Street, offering a special locally-infused Mexican menu. Indulge in unique fusion dishes like Chicken Rice Chimichanga and Crispy Seafood Otah, crafted to commemorate the nation's birthday. Complement your meal with the limited-time sharing Singarita while enjoying stunning views of the Singapore skyline from the rooftop bar. On Saturday evenings, enhance your dining experience with a direct backdrop of the NDP fireworks display. An in-house DJ will keep the festive vibe alive, and an infinity pool is available for a refreshing dip, making it a perfect spot for a unique National Day celebration. Prices are subject to service charge and GST.
datetime_display: From 6pm daily (Available from 4pm on Saturdays), around National Day period 2025
venue_name: El Chido, RF at Pullman Singapore Hill Street

title: Durian Fiesta at Ellenborough Market Café for National Day 2025
description: Indulge in Singapore's favourite fruit at the Durian Fiesta at Ellenborough Market Café, Paradox Singapore Merchant Court, celebrating National Day. This delectable buffet spread highlights the 'King of Fruits' in unique dishes such as Durian Fried Rice and Hokkaido Pumpkin Durian Cream Soup, alongside classic desserts like Durian Hazelnut Choux and the signature Durian Pengat. For the ultimate durian lover, an exclusive Durian Fruit Bazaar offers unlimited servings of fresh durian at an alfresco live station overlooking the Singapore River. This special bazaar is available exclusively for dinner on Thursdays and on National Day, promising an unparalleled durian experience. Prices exclude service charge and GST.
price_display: $98 per adult, $42 per child. Durian Fruit Bazaar: $138/adult, $50/child
datetime_display: 1 July – 31 August 2025 (Friday – Sunday), 6:30pm – 10pm. Durian Fruit Bazaar: Thursdays between 18 July and 8 August 2025, and on 9 August 2025
venue_name: Ellenborough Market Café, Paradox Singapore Merchant Court

title: Edge's National Day Buffet: A Culinary Journey of Singaporean Flavours
description: Commemorate National Day with Edge's special buffet at Pan Pacific Singapore, featuring a lavish spread of Singapore's most iconic dishes. Indulge in local favourites from a live Kueh Pie Tie station, Bak Kut Teh, Singapore Laksa with Baby Lobster, and Bak Chor Mee. The buffet also boasts a unique pop-up drinks stall offering Teh Tarik, Iced Limau, Soya Cincao, and a Virgin Singapore Sling. The dessert station presents exclusive local treats like Ice Cheng Teng Soup, Lychee Bandung Compote Trifle, Milo Dinosaur Panna Cotta, Kueh Lapis, and a special Chempedak Cake. Don't miss the ice cream station with classic sandwich and potong ice cream. Special pricing is available for Singapore citizens born in 1965. Prices exclude service charge and GST.
price_display: Dinner: $128 per adult, $64 per child (6 – 12 years old); Lunch: $128 per adult, $64 per child (6 – 12 years old). Citizens born in 1965: $88 per adult.

title: The Capitol Kempinski Hotel's National Day Three-Course Set Menu
description: Celebrate Singapore's birthday with an exquisite National Day three-course set menu at 15 Stamford, The Capitol Kempinski Hotel Singapore. This culinary journey reimagines international cuisines with a local twist, featuring delightful dishes such as Foie Gras Kaya Toast – a smooth foie gras and organic egg foam layered with kaya in a soft brioche bun – and tender prime ribs glazed with an angelica barbeque sauce, inspired by Bak Kut Teh. Indulge in the Laksa, perfectly complemented by succulent Hokkaido scallops, and finish with a Pandan Tiramisu. For an elevated experience on National Day, opt for exclusive rooftop access at Eden Residences for unobstructed fireworks views with free-flow champagne. Prices are subject to service charge and GST.
price_display: $59++ per person (add $59++ for rooftop access with champagne)

title: Local Food Parade @Stevens: A Month-Long National Day Hawker Feast
description: Novotel Singapore on Stevens invites you to a month-long celebration of National Day with the Local Food Parade @ Stevens. This gastronomic event will feature over 50 iconic hawker dishes for one night only on National Day itself, promising a nostalgic journey through Singapore's culinary heritage. Highlights include Janggkut Katong Laksa, Original Serangoon Hokkien Mee, Rochor Original Beancurd, and Heng Kee Curry Noodles. Satisfy your sweet cravings with Uncle Ice Cream and Kacang Puteh Uncle. The buffet includes a live telecast of the National Day Parade, allowing you to dine while tuning in. Stay for performances by local artists and buskers and enjoy bottomless servings of the signature @Stevens Singlish Beer. Special birthday promotion for Singapore citizens born on August 9th. Prices exclude service charge and GST.
price_display: $59++ per adult (dine free if born on Singapore's birthday with two paying adults)
datetime_display: Month-long festivities, one night for hawker dishes on 9 August 2025, performances until 8:30pm

title: Gardens by The Bay & Mediacorp National Day Concert 2025
description: The Gardens by The Bay and Mediacorp National Day Concert returns for its sixth edition with the theme 'Our Home, Our Heart, Our Singapore.' This year's concert will be headlined by local talent Olivia Ong and feature other homegrown artists, including Benjamin Kheng. Beyond the musical performances, the concert offers exciting family activities such as go-kart races, carnival games, and roving acts by stilt walkers and jugglers. The event culminates in a spectacular fireworks display against the stunning Supertree backdrop, creating an unforgettable experience. This free-to-attend concert is a highlight of Singapore's National Day celebrations, drawing crowds to enjoy the festive atmosphere and celebrate national pride. Doors open at 4:30pm.
organiser: Gardens by The Bay and Mediacorp
venue_name: The Meadow, Gardens by the Bay

title: Singapore Flyer National Day Moonlight Flight: An Overnight Panoramic Experience
description: Celebrate National Day with the Singapore Flyer's unique Moonlight Flight, a first-of-its-kind overnight experience. This one-day-only event on August 9th takes you from 11pm to 8am the next morning, offering breathtaking panoramic views of Singapore under the moonlight and sunrise. Tickets include free admission to the Time Capsule, an interactive journey through Singapore's past, present, and future. To enhance the festivities, a night market with various F&B options and ample seating provides a perfect spot to enjoy the ambiance and catch the fireworks. Singapore Citizens and Permanent Residents born in August can enjoy free entry with every paying guest, making it a special way to celebrate the nation's birthday.

title: JW Marriott South Beach: Premier Views and Culinary Delights for NDP Fireworks
description: Witness the spectacular National Day Parade fireworks display over the Marina Bay skyline from the luxurious comfort of JW Marriott Singapore South Beach. Book a Premier Marina Bay Room or Suite for a family staycation, offering spacious, designer-led decor and a floating king-size bed. Guests can also enjoy the glittering fireworks from the Flow18 Sky Garden and swimming pool. During this celebratory period, indulge in the signature Chefs-on-Show Seafood Buffet at Beach Road Kitchen. The culinary spread features an array of Singaporean flavours, international delights, fresh seafood on ice, Bak Kwa pizza, chilli crab pasta, and delectable durian treats for dessert, promising a lavish dining experience during the National Day festivities. Prices exclude service charge and GST.
price_display: Dinner (8 – 11 Aug): $108++; Lunch (9 Aug): $108++; Brunch (11 Aug): $118++

title: National Day Celebrations at Pororo Park Singapore: Mascot Parade and Carnival
description: Pororo Park Singapore hosts a special National Day celebration packed with family fun on August 9th, from 6pm to 9pm. The park transforms into its own NDP event, featuring exciting carnival games, creative balloon sculpting, and fun Pororo & Friends tattoos. The highlight includes a lively mascot parade and a live stream of the National Day Parade. Located in Marina Square, Pororo Park offers a special fireworks viewing segment, allowing little ones to watch the stunning display live. Each child also receives a special goodie bag worth $100, filled with Pororo merchandise, snacks, and vouchers, making it a memorable celebration for young families. Promotions are valid throughout August.

title: NTUC x NDP Bay Celebrations: Live Performances and Fireworks at Promontory
description: NTUC hosts its first large-scale National Day event in over a decade as part of the extended NDP celebrations at the Promontory @ Marina Bay. This vibrant event on August 3rd and 9th will feature captivating live musical performances and a live broadcast of the National Day Parade. Attendees can witness the majestic state flag flypast, the 'Salute to the Nation' bomb burst by the RSAF, and the presidential gun salute sail-past. The Total Defence 40 dynamic defence display, including a high-speed chase, adds to the excitement. The evening culminates with a spectacular fireworks display. Each attendee receives an NDP fun pack, and there will be photo booths and interactive installations for all to enjoy. Balloting for tickets is now closed.

title: One Punggol's National Day Celebrations: Family Activities and Flypast
description: North-east residents can rejoice with extensive National Day celebrations at One Punggol, spanning two separate days. On August 3rd, enjoy a variety of engaging activities including captivating stage performances, hands-on craft workshops where you can create your own Merlion plushies, exciting movie screenings, and fun arcade games, alongside bouncy castles for the younger ones. A sing-along segment invites everyone to show their patriotism by singing along to favourite NDP tunes. On August 9th, live screenings of the National Day Parade will be available, with the highlight being the State Flag Flypast and the Six F-16s Flypast soaring through the Punggol district. This free event offers diverse family fun.

title: MAJULAH FIESTA: National Day Celebrations at Singapore Sports Hub
description: The Singapore Sports Hub brings back its National Day festivities with the 'Together We Play, As One United People' theme, offering three weeks of activities. Get into the patriotic spirit by trying a new sport at the Sports Tryouts or groove to the beat at the Majulah Fiesta Fitness Party. Pet owners can even bring their furry friends along for Pets Play Day. Programme highlights include the Lion City Dance Convention and the Active Health Fitness Challenge. The celebrations culminate on August 9th with a live telecast of the NDP, complete with flypast and fireworks, providing a vibrant and active way for all to celebrate Singapore's independence. Check the full itinerary on their website. This event is free for all attendees.

title: National Day Celebrations at Various Community Centres Across Singapore
description: Kick off National Day celebrations a week early at various heartland community centres across Singapore. These family-friendly festivities, starting from August 3rd, feature a diverse range of exciting weekend activities suitable for all ages. Enjoy lively carnivals, invigorating fitness events, indulgent durian parties, and even local fireworks displays at selected locations. These community-led celebrations are the perfect way to immerse yourself in the National Day spirit, connect with your neighbours, and partake in a vibrant atmosphere of national pride right in your own neighbourhood. Details for specific activities and locations will be updated as more information is released by local community councils, ensuring a festive build-up to August 9th.

title: Bollywood Farms: Organic Farm Tours & Horticultural Programmes
description: Explore Bollywood Farms, a renowned organic vegetable and fruit farm in Singapore, offering a unique farm-to-table experience. Participate in independent or guided tours to learn about organic farming practices, including the cultivation of over 20 varieties of bananas. Engage in hands-on horticultural programmes, where kids can experience planting rice and other activities to understand urban farming. The farm also features an on-site bistro, Poison Ivy, serving fresh produce, and a culinary school. This educational and engaging experience is perfect for families looking to connect with nature and learn about sustainable food sources in the tranquil Kranji countryside.

title: ComCrop: Free Monthly Sustainable Rooftop Urban Farm Tours
description: Discover ComCrop, Singapore's pioneering commercial rooftop farming company dedicated to sustainable urban farming. Join their free monthly tours to learn about their innovative methods for growing fresh, tasty, and pesticide-free produce in the city. These tours offer insights into hydroponic farming and the company's commitment to sustainability. While monthly free tours are offered, it's recommended to contact ComCrop directly if you wish to visit on a specific date to ensure availability and scheduling. This is an excellent opportunity for families and individuals interested in modern agriculture and urban sustainability practices.

title: Edible Garden City: Food Garden Farming & Gardening Workshops
description: Participate in engaging farming and gardening workshops at Edible Garden City, a company renowned for designing, building, and maintaining food gardens across Singapore. Learn practical skills in urban agriculture, suitable for enthusiasts of all levels. These workshops delve into sustainable gardening techniques, including hydroponic farming. Edible Garden City also develops and runs farming curriculum in schools, benefiting both teachers and students. Their farm serves as a hub for fresh herbs, flowers, and vegetables supplied to various establishments and families through their Citizen Box programme. Join a workshop to cultivate your green thumb and contribute to a greener Singapore.

title: Kin Yan Agrotech: Organic Farm Visits, Cooking & Juicing Demos
description: Visit Kin Yan Agrotech, Singapore's largest organic wheatgrass farm, also known for growing fresh edible cactuses, aloe vera, mushrooms, and roselle fruits. The farm welcomes the public to wander around and observe the production of organic wheatgrass and other unique produce. Enhance your experience by participating in their live cooking demonstrations, showcasing how to prepare dishes with their fresh ingredients, or join wheatgrass juicing sessions to learn about its health benefits. You can also purchase a selection of fresh produce directly from the farm. This provides a fascinating and educational outing for families and individuals interested in organic farming and healthy living.
price_display: Varies by activity, entry generally free
datetime_display: Ongoing, check website for schedule of demos

title: Kok Fah Technology Farm: Weekend Market & Hydroponics Tours
description: Experience a day of fun and discovery at Kok Fah Technology Farm, a local family-owned business specializing in leafy vegetables. Explore their popular Weekend Market, open Fridays to Sundays from 9am to 5pm, offering freshly harvested vegetables, exotic imported vegetables, and dried goods. Take a guided tour through their innovative hydroponics greenhouse, which includes an aloe vera demonstration and a complimentary lettuce sample pack along with their homegrown Honey Aloe Vera Drink. The farm also features a mini 'zoo' area and sheltered picnic spots, making it a perfect family outing with various add-on activities available to enhance your farm tour experience.
price_display: Varies by tour/activity, market entry free
datetime_display: Weekend Market: Fridays to Sundays, 9am - 5pm. Tours: Ongoing, call to book.

title: Experience Traditional Longkang Fishing at Qian Hu Fish Farm
description: Longkang fishing at Qian Hu Fish Farm offers a unique and engaging experience for children, recreating the traditional Singaporean pastime of catching fish in drains. Participants are provided with a net and a plastic fish tank to catch guppies in a series of ponds and canals. The fish caught are yours to keep, making it a memorable and interactive activity. This hands-on adventure is an excellent way for kids to connect with nature and engage in a beloved cultural activity. It promotes patience and observation skills in a fun, outdoor setting, perfect for family outings. The activity is designed to be accessible and enjoyable for a wide range of ages, providing an authentic and educational experience that combines leisure with learning about local traditions and aquatic life in a natural environment.
price_display: $7 per person for 30 minutes; $12 per person for 60 minutes
datetime_display: Daily, during opening hours (Mon-Fri & Eve of Public Holidays: 9am-6pm; Sat-Sun & Public Holidays: 9am-7pm)

title: Relaxing Fish Spa Experience at Qian Hu Fish Farm for All Ages
description: Treat yourself to a unique and ticklish spa moment at the Qian Hu Fish Spa. Immerse your feet in the soothing waters where Garra Rufa fish, also known as 'doctor fish', gently nibble away dead skin cells. This natural exfoliation process provides a refreshing and painless pedicure, leaving your feet feeling revitalized. It's a fun and unusual way to relax after exploring the farm, suitable for both adults and children. The fish spa offers a tranquil escape and an interactive experience with these fascinating aquatic creatures, making it a memorable part of your visit to Qian Hu Fish Farm.
price_display: $10 per adult; $5 per child or senior citizen for 30 minutes
datetime_display: Daily, during opening hours (Mon-Fri & Eve of Public Holidays: 9am-6pm; Sat-Sun & Public Holidays: 9am-7pm)

title: Discover Diverse Aquatic Life at Qian Hu Fish Farm's Fish Gallery
description: The Fish Gallery at Qian Hu Fish Farm is a captivating haven for ornamental fish enthusiasts and curious visitors alike. It showcases over 1,000 species and varieties of ornamental fish from around the globe, alongside unique marine life such as albino turtles, polkadot stingrays, prawns, frogs, and eels. Aisles of meticulously maintained tanks allow visitors to marvel at the vibrant colours and intricate patterns of these aquatic creatures. This indoor exhibition offers a tranquil and educational experience, providing insights into the diverse world beneath the water's surface. It's an ideal spot for all ages to appreciate the beauty of marine ecosystems and learn about various aquatic species.
datetime_display: Daily, during opening hours (Mon-Fri & Eve of Public Holidays: 9am-6pm; Sat-Sun & Public Holidays: 9am-7pm)

title: Guided Educational Farm Tour Experience at Qian Hu Fish Farm
description: Enhance your visit to Qian Hu Fish Farm by embarking on an informative guided farm tour. These comprehensive tour packages offer an in-depth look into the fascinating world of ornamental fish. Participants will learn about the origins of various fish species, their natural habitats, and the intricate processes involved in fish farming. It's an educational experience designed to provide a deeper understanding of aquatic life and conservation efforts. Some packages also include a relaxing fish spa session, combining learning with a unique wellness activity. This tour is perfect for those keen to go beyond casual observation and gain expert insights into the diverse aquatic ecosystem at Qian Hu Fish Farm, making it both enriching and engaging for all participants.
price_display: Packages start from $5 per child and senior citizen, $8 per adult for Guided Tour and 45-minute Fish Spa experience.
datetime_display: Daily, during opening hours, by appointment or schedule (Mon-Fri & Eve of Public Holidays: 9am-6pm; Sat-Sun & Public Holidays: 9am-7pm)

title: Watch UEFA Champions League 2025 Final in Singapore
description: The much-anticipated UEFA Champions League 2025 final match will see Paris Saint-Germain F.C. going head-to-head with Inter Milan. This pinnacle of Europe's premier club football tournament is one of the most anticipated events of the year, with fans gathering to cheer on their favourite teams. The final will take place at Allianz Arena in Munich, Germany, on 31 May 2025, corresponding to 3am SGT on 1 June 2025. Football enthusiasts in Singapore can find various venues like Cafe Football, Lau Pa Sat, and Harry's Bar to catch the live action on a big screen, or stream it via cable or VPN services.
price_display: Free to watch at selected venues or via streaming

title: UEFA Champions League Semi-Final: Inter Milan vs. Barcelona
description: Catch the thrilling second leg of the UEFA Champions League 2025 semi-finals as Inter Milan goes head-to-head with Barcelona. This crucial match determines who advances to the highly anticipated final. Fans in Singapore can follow the live action via cable services like beIN Sports (Singtel or Starhub) or explore online streaming options using a VPN to access international broadcasters. While the article mentions various Singapore venues for watching the finals, this specific semi-final match can be enjoyed from the comfort of your home or at a sports bar.
price_display: Free to watch via streaming or with cable subscription

title: UEFA Champions League Semi-Final: PSG vs. Arsenal Match
description: Don't miss the exciting second leg of the UEFA Champions League 2025 semi-finals featuring Paris Saint-Germain and Arsenal. This critical encounter will determine a contender for the prestigious final, promising intense football action. Viewers in Singapore can tune in through cable providers such as beIN Sports (available on Singtel and Starhub) or leverage VPN services to access live streams from international broadcasters. The article provides details on where to watch the general Champions League action, ensuring fans can catch this match from home or at local sports bars.
price_display: Free to watch via streaming or with cable subscription

title: Bird Paradise Backstage Pass: Penguin Encounters Experience
description: Embark on an exclusive behind-the-scenes adventure at Ocean Network Express Penguin Cove to intimately encounter the charming king, gentoo, and northern rockhopper penguins. Discover the dedicated care zookeepers provide, including their rigorous feeding routines, and gain a unique glimpse into the daily preparation of their meals. This immersive experience offers rare photo opportunities with these magnificent birds, allowing for truly memorable moments while learning about their conservation efforts. Participants will deepen their understanding of avian healthcare and the efforts taken to maintain the penguins' health and well-being in their sub-Antarctic environment, enhancing your visit to Bird Paradise.
datetime_display: Starts 7 June 2025, 10:30 AM - 11:30 AM (daily session example)
venue_name: Ocean Network Express Penguin Cove, Bird Paradise

title: Predators on Wings: Majestic Bird of Prey Presentation
description: Witness the awe-inspiring power and agility of magnificent birds of prey at the Sky Amphitheatre. This captivating 15 to 20-minute presentation features formidable species such as the White-bellied Sea Eagle, Turkey Vultures, and Harris's Hawks, demonstrating their natural hunting and scavenging behaviours. Observe their incredible flight capabilities as they soar through the expansive amphitheatre, providing a thrilling and educational experience. Learn about their crucial role in the ecosystem and the conservation efforts dedicated to these apex predators. This is a must-see highlight for all visitors, offering a unique opportunity to connect with these fierce and majestic creatures in action.

title: Wings of the World: A Spectacular Avian Performance
description: Experience a vibrant and engaging performance showcasing the intelligence and agility of Bird Paradise's most beloved feathered stars. This 15 to 20-minute show at the Sky Amphitheatre features a delightful cast of birds, including colorful parrots and the charismatic pied hornbill duo, Sunny and Vicky. Watch as they engage in friendly duels, demonstrating their speed, showmanship, and intricate flying skills. There's even an opportunity for audience participation, where you might be invited to hold a knotted rope with treats for the parrots, creating an interactive and memorable experience. This presentation offers a wonderful chance to appreciate the diverse talents of these fascinating birds.

title: Macaw Keeper Talk: Discover the Vibrant World of Macaws
description: Join an insightful and interactive session at the Hong Leong Foundation Crimson Wetlands where expert bird keepers will share fascinating facts about the stunning macaws. Learn about their unique behaviors, vibrant plumage, and the crucial conservation efforts dedicated to these magnificent birds. Witness these majestic creatures as they enjoy their afternoon snack, providing a wonderful opportunity to observe them up close in their naturalistic habitat. This talk offers a deeper understanding of avian care and the importance of protecting these intelligent and colorful species, making for an enriching educational experience for all visitors at Bird Paradise.
venue_name: Hong Leong Foundation Crimson Wetlands, Bird Paradise

title: Penguin Keeper Talk: Insights into Flightless Wonders
description: Engage in an informative and interactive session at the Ocean Network Express Penguin Cove, where expert keepers will unveil captivating facts about the park's adorable flightless birds. Gain a deeper understanding of the various penguin species housed here, their daily routines, and the specialized care they receive. Observe these charming birds as they enjoy their afternoon snack, offering a unique opportunity for up-close observation and learning. This session highlights the conservation initiatives that protect these fascinating aquatic creatures and ensures their well-being within their sub-Antarctic environment at Bird Paradise, making it a compelling educational experience.
venue_name: Ocean Network Express Penguin Cove, Bird Paradise

title: Hornbill Keeper Talk: Discover the Iconic Hornbills
description: Participate in an insightful and interactive session at the Kuok Group Wings of Asia, where expert bird keepers will share intriguing facts about the impressive hornbills. Learn about their distinctive features, unique behaviors, and the vital conservation efforts aimed at protecting these iconic birds. Witness these magnificent creatures as they enjoy their afternoon snack, providing an excellent opportunity for close observation and understanding. This talk deepens your appreciation for avian diversity and the crucial role hornbills play in their ecosystems, enriching your visit to Bird Paradise with valuable educational insights into these remarkable birds.
venue_name: Kuok Group Wings of Asia, Bird Paradise

title: Songbirds Keeper Talk: A Symphony of Avian Melodies
description: Join an engaging and interactive session at Songs of the Forest, where expert bird keepers will share fascinating insights into the park's beautiful songbirds. Discover the unique vocalizations, behaviors, and ecological roles of these melodious avian species. Observe these charming birds as they enjoy their afternoon snack, offering a delightful opportunity for close-up views and learning. This talk highlights the conservation efforts dedicated to protecting songbirds and their habitats, enriching your understanding of avian biodiversity and the delicate balance of forest ecosystems, providing a harmonious and educational experience at Bird Paradise for all who attend.
venue_name: Songs of the Forest, Bird Paradise

title: Starlings and Weavers Feeding: Interactive Mealworm Experience
description: Participate in a unique interactive feeding session at Nyungwe Forest Heart of Africa, where you can hand-feed starlings and weavers with mealworms, and colorful turacos with fresh fruits. This intimate encounter allows you to get up close with these fascinating birds and observe their feeding habits firsthand. Based on a first-come-first-served basis, ensure to book your spot online and arrive 15 minutes prior to the session. This experience is a wonderful way to connect with avian wildlife while supporting conservation efforts, offering a memorable and educational opportunity for visitors to Bird Paradise. Participants must be at least 1.2 meters tall.
venue_name: Nyungwe Forest Heart of Africa, Bird Paradise

title: Shorebird Feeding: Pelican and Stork Encounter
description: Head to the pavilion overlooking the picturesque paddy fields at Kuok Group Wings of Asia for an extraordinary shorebird feeding session. Here, you will have the unique opportunity to feed pelicans and storks with fish, observing their impressive feeding behaviors up close. This interactive experience is conducted on a first-come-first-served basis, so it is advisable to book your preferred session online and arrive 15 minutes before the scheduled time. This activity offers a fantastic chance to learn about these wading birds and their natural environment while supporting conservation efforts at Bird Paradise. Participants must be at least 1.2 meters tall.
venue_name: Kuok Group Wings of Asia, Bird Paradise

title: Lories and Lorikeets Feeding: A Colorful Nectar Experience
description: Immerse yourself in a vibrant and interactive feeding session at Lory Loft, reminiscent of the beloved Jurong Bird Park experience. Witness a spectacular flock of colorful lories and parrots eagerly awaiting their nectar, as you pick up your cup of homemade nectar to hand-feed these friendly birds. This up-close encounter provides an exceptional photo opportunity, as these delightful birds may perch on your wrist. Available on a first-come-first-served basis, remember to book your slot online and arrive 15 minutes early to secure your participation. This engaging activity offers a memorable connection with these charming birds at Bird Paradise. Participants must be at least 1.2 meters tall.

title: Cassowary Feeding: Up-Close Encounter with Giant Birds
description: Experience a thrilling and rare opportunity to hand-feed the magnificent, huge flightless cassowaries at Mysterious Papua. Admire their impressive size and striking bright blue necks as you engage in this unique interactive session. Available on a first-come-first-served basis, ensure to book your preferred session online and arrive 15 minutes prior to the feeding time. This up-close encounter provides an unforgettable experience and a deeper appreciation for these unique and powerful birds, highlighting their conservation importance. It offers a memorable and educational opportunity for visitors to Bird Paradise. Participants must be at least 1.2 meters tall.
